description.en_US: (doctree compress) provides up to 12 functions, including flow layout/ indentation adjustment/ hide bubble/ shield button/ font size/ mouse hover, etc., to completely customize your document tree
description.zh_CN: （文档树压缩）提供多达20余项功能，包括 流动布局/ 缩进调节/ 隐藏气泡/ 屏蔽按钮/ 字体大小/ 鼠标悬浮/ 层级竖线/ 分割线/ 等等，完全自定义您的文档树
